name: Selettrice Vaalmonica
text: If this card is Normal or Pendulum Summoned: You can add 1 "Vaalmonica" card from your Deck to your hand, except "Selettrice Vaalmonica". If this card is sent to the GY and you have 2 "Vaalmonica" cards in your Pendulum Zone: You can add this card to your hand. You can only use each of the previous effects of "Selettrice Vaalmonica" once per turn. Your opponent's monsters cannot target this card for attacks while you control a monster other than "Selettrice Vaalmonica".
